Reason: The 'stream_entire_sstables' configuration is performance-sensitive. This is because enabling this configuration directly impacts system performance at the system level by significantly speeding up network transfer through zero-copy streaming of entire SSTables between nodes. This operation is time-expensive and memory-expensive, leading to notable performance variations. Additionally, the code context shows that the configuration is checked before deciding to stream SSTables, indicating its importance in determining performance-critical operations.
